content: PAPOTTI Paolo | EURECOM Skip to main content SEARCH Ok Menu print PAPOTTI Paolo Name : PAPOTTI Paolo Service : EURECOM - Data Science Function : Professor Email : Paolo.Papotti@eurecom.fr Phone : 8147 Office : 423 Website : http://www.eurecom.fr/~papotti Teaching Database systems implementation Current Research Topics User-centric data cleaning Automatic fact-checking Selected Publications 2019 - Meta-mappings for schema mapping reuse 2018 - Robust discovery of positive and negative rules in knowledge-bases 2018 - Synthesizing entity matching rules by examples SEARCH Ok About me HomepageBiographyResearchTeachingPublications (151) Distinctions Distinctions Best Resource Paper Award at ISWC 2024 (International Semantic Web Conference, Baltimore, USA) the paper “CimpleKG: A Continuously Updated Knowledge Graph on Misinformation, Factors and Fact-Checks”. In 2020, he reveives one of the Google Faculty Research Awards 2019-2020 in the "Structured Data" category Distinguished Reviewer Award for VLDB 2019 Distinguished Reviewer Award for VLDB 2018 Best Demo Award for "DataXFormer: An Interactive Data Transformation Tool" (SIGMOD 2015) Google Faculty Research Award, Fall 2015 Profiles Profiles Google Scholar Citations LinkedIn Orcid ResearchGate DBLP Acm Digital Library Scopus IEEEXplore Web of Science Legal Notice Accueil EURECOM Presentation Virtual campus tour Director's remark International dimension Ranking and recognition Presence in Sophia-Antipolis History Quality approach Gender equality Disabilities management SGVB Prevention Contacts Newsroom Réseaux sociaux Brochures Press releases News EURECOM Research Blog EURECOM on I'MTech Blog Job opportunities Job opportunities EURECOM Appels d'offres Teaching Why EURECOM?
